description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的一所已不存在的私立大学。
description.en: A defunct private university located in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 黄埔军校武汉分校，是第一次国共合作时期中国国民党在中国武汉创办的一所军校。
description.en: The Wuhan branch of the Whampoa Military Academy, a military academy founded by the Kuomintang in Wuhan, China, during the First United Front.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校，是中华民国创建的第一所革命军事院校。
description.en: The Republic of China Military Academy is the first revolutionary military academy established by the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者及新四军重要领导者之一，中国军事家。
description.en: One of the founders of the People's Liberation Army, a key leader of the New Fourth Army, and a Chinese military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党为反击中国国民党清党而发动的武装起义。
description.en: An armed insurrection launched by the Chinese Communist Party in response to the Kuomintang's purges.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期重要领导人之一，广州起义主要领导人。
description.en: One of the early important leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and a main leader of the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的卓越领导人。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and an outstanding leader of the CPC, PRC, and PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广州发动的旨在推翻国民政府的武装起义。
description.en: An armed insurrection launched by the Chinese Communist Party in Guangzhou aimed at overthrowing the Nationalist government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治人物，晋系军阀领导人。
description.en: A military strategist and political figure of the Republic of China, and the leader of the Shanxi clique of warlords.

description.zh-cn: 全称山西牺牲救国同盟会，是抗日战争时期在山西成立的抗日民族统一战线组织。
description.en: The full name is the Shanxi Sacrifice for National Salvation Alliance, an anti-Japanese national united front organization established in Shanxi during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

zh-cn: 山西新军决死第二纵队

description.zh-cn: 山西新军的一支部队，由中国共产党实际领导。
description.en: A unit of the Shanxi New Army, actually led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，阎锡山晋绥军与中国共产党领导的山西新军之间的一场大规模武装冲突。
description.en: A large-scale armed conflict between Yan Xishan's Jin-Sui Army and the Communist-led Shanxi New Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的派出机构。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的卓越领导人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the preeminent leaders of the CPC and the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在晋南沁阳县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Qinyang County, Southern Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在太岳区第四地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in the Fourth Prefecture of the Taiyue Area.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在豫西第一地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in the First Prefecture of Western Henan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支著名部队。
description.en: A famous unit of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安康地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in the Ankang Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在安康地区的军事机构。
description.en: The military establishment of the People's Liberation Army in the Ankang area.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在20世纪50年代初在中国大陆进行的土地所有权改革运动。
description.en: A land ownership reform movement carried out by the Chinese Communist Party in mainland China in the early 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会负责农村工作的部门。
description.en: The department responsible for rural work under the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西安市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Xi'an City.

nodes.id: 黄河中游水土保持委员会

zh-cn: 黄河中游水土保持委员会

description.zh-cn: 负责黄河中游地区水土保持工作的机构。
description.en: An agency responsible for water and soil conservation in the middle reaches of the Yellow River.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间的一起重大冤假错案。
description.en: A major case of injustice, falsehood, and error during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第五届全国委员会。
description.en: The 5th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省资阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Ziyang City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都和直辖市。
description.en: The capital and a direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷出生于四川省安岳县。
description.en: Tang Fanglei was born in Anyue County, Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1926年，唐方雷考入上海大同大学读书。
description.en: In 1926, Tang Fanglei was admitted to study at Great China University in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月，唐方雷考入武汉中央军校，成为黄埔军校第五期学员。
description.en: In April 1927, Tang Fanglei was admitted to the Wuhan Central Military Academy, becoming a cadet of the 5th graduating class of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 武汉中央军校通常被视为黄埔军校的分校。
description.en: The Wuhan Central Military Academy is often considered a branch of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷随叶挺、贺龙部队参加南昌起事。
description.en: Tang Fanglei participated in the Nanchang Uprising with the troops of Ye Ting and He Long.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺是南昌起事的重要领导者之一。
description.en: Ye Ting was one of the key leaders of the Nanchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 贺龙是南昌起事的重要领导者之一。
description.en: He Long was one of the key leaders of the Nanchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷参加了由张太雷、叶剑英领导的广州起义。
description.en: Tang Fanglei participated in the Guangzhou Uprising led by Zhang Tailei and Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷是广州起义的主要领导人。
description.en: Zhang Tailei was a main leader of the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英是广州起义的主要领导人之一。
description.en: Ye Jianying was one of the main leaders of the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷在广州起义战役后被捕入狱。
description.en: Tang Fanglei was arrested and imprisoned after the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 1931年12月，唐方雷在太原组织阎锡山部队的一团兵变，企图投奔红军但失败。
description.en: In December 1931, Tang Fanglei organized a mutiny of a regiment of Yan Xishan's troops in Taiyuan, attempting to defect to the Red Army, but failed.

description.zh-cn: 1937年3月，唐方雷到山西牺盟会组训会任工作员、指导员。
description.en: In March 1937, Tang Fanglei served as a staff member and instructor at the Shanxi Sacrifice League's organization and training department.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 1938年秋，唐方雷调任决死二纵队政治部副主任。
description.en: In the autumn of 1938, Tang Fanglei was transferred to serve as the Deputy Director of the Political Department of the Determined to Die Second Column.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷在1939年12月的晋西事变中担任前敌总指挥。
description.en: Tang Fanglei served as the front-line commander-in-chief during the Jinxi Incident in December 1939.

description.zh-cn: 1940年，唐方雷调太行山北方局任秘书科科长。
description.en: In 1940, Tang Fanglei was transferred to the Northern Bureau in the Taihang Mountains to serve as the Chief of the Secretariat Section.

description.zh-cn: 1940年，唐方雷担任彭德怀的秘书。
description.en: In 1940, Tang Fanglei served as Peng Dehuai's secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1944年6月至1945年4月，唐方雷担任中共晋南沁阳县委书记。
description.en: From June 1944 to April 1945, Tang Fanglei served as the Secretary of the CPC Jinnan Qinyang County Committee.

position.en: Deputy Secretary and Director of the Social Affairs Department

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，唐方雷任中共太岳区第四地委副书记兼社会部部长。
description.en: In August 1945, Tang Fanglei was appointed Deputy Secretary and Director of the Social Affairs Department of the CPC Taiyue Area Fourth Prefectural Committee.

position.en: Secretary and Political Commissar of the Military Sub-district

description.zh-cn: 1947年9月，唐方雷任中共豫西一地委书记兼军分区政委。
description.en: In September 1947, Tang Fanglei was appointed Secretary and Political Commissar of the Military Sub-district of the CPC Western Henan First Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷曾配合三十八军军长孔从周作战两年多。
description.en: Tang Fanglei collaborated with Kong Congzhou, commander of the 38th Army, in combat for over two years.

description.zh-cn: 孔从周曾任三十八军军长。
description.en: Kong Congzhou once served as the commander of the 38th Army.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，唐方雷任中共安康地委书记。
description.en: In 1949, Tang Fanglei was appointed Secretary of the CPC Ankang Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，唐方雷兼任安康军分区政委。
description.en: In 1949, Tang Fanglei also served as the Political Commissar of the Ankang Military Sub-district.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷在安康地区领导并进行土地改革工作。
description.en: Tang Fanglei led and carried out land reform work in the Ankang area.

description.zh-cn: 1953年，唐方雷任陕西省委农村工作部部长。
description.en: In 1953, Tang Fanglei was appointed Director of the Rural Work Department of the Shaanxi Provincial Committee.

position.en: Secretary of the Secretariat and Deputy Mayor

description.zh-cn: 1960年8月至1963年10月，唐方雷任中共西安市委书记处书记兼副市长。
description.en: From August 1960 to October 1963, Tang Fanglei served as Secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Xi'an Municipal Committee and Deputy Mayor.

relationships.target: 黄河中游水土保持委员会

description.zh-cn: 1964年秋，唐方雷任黄河中游水土保持委员会副主任。
description.en: In the autumn of 1964, Tang Fanglei was appointed Deputy Director of the Yellow River Middle Reaches Water and Soil Conservation Committee.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷在文化大革命期间受到迫害。
description.en: Tang Fanglei was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷因卷入六十一人叛徒集团案而在文化大革命期间受到迫害。
description.en: Tang Fanglei was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution due to his involvement in the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 1979年平反后，唐方雷任全国政协五届委员会委员。
description.en: After his rehabilitation in 1979, Tang Fanglei served as a member of the 5th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 唐方雷是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Tang Fanglei was a member of the Communist Party of China.
